summary: There are a lot of cool weapon mods on the nexus, this mod aims to add some of them to the world of skyrim, both in levelled lists and as unique weapons for special NPCs.
descriptionHtml:
==Version 3.0==
This is probably the last version I'll release (at least unless someone points me to more awesome weapons).

With this version I've focussed on decreasing the number of mods you need to install and increasing the number of mods included. New with this version are weapons from [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/5534177-maibatsu/]MAIBATSU[/url], [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/10640857-zikoru/]Zikoru[/url] and a few from [b]747823.[/b]

==Description==

There are a lot of cool weapon mods on the nexus, this mod aims to add some of them to the world of skyrim, both in levelled lists and as unique weapons for special NPC's. I've tried to assign weapons logically, and as such some weapons are not included as they are not lore friendly.

To use it, you will need to install a number of weapon mods first. There is also an optional file that adds weapons to NPC's from Interesting NPC's, by Kris Takahashi (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429)

Resources from the following users are included in this mod:
~ InsanitySorrow (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945)
~ Ghosu (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3297180)
~ Elvarheim (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6460325/?)
~ Kettlewitch (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6140922/?)
~ Urwy (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12087/?)
~MAIBATSU (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5534177/?)
~Zikoru (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10640857/?) - Be aware his weapons are included as unique weapons weilded by certain jarls
~747823 (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3871/?)
Please endorse them, it would be awesome for more users to allow their resources to be used in this way.


The following mods need to be installed in order to use my mod. Install these before trying to install my mod:
~ Heavy Armory (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21120)
~ Jaysus Swords (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1002)

Thanks to Elvarheim for allowing me to include his two weapons Azincourt and Cyrodillic Steel Dagger in this download, meaning that from 2.0 + you no longer need to install them separately.

Don't forget to create a bashed patch in order to use this mod with others such as LWE, Immersive Weapons, etc.

If you want to modify my mod, go ahead - but please give credit to me and the mesh authors for any resources used. Also, please don't re-upload this file elsewhere - just point them here.

This Mod includes no scripts, is clean, and all included textures are fully optimised by DDSopt.
author: Witnaaay
